entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dempster (Highway)

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Snow near the Ogilvie mountains overnight. Blowing snow near the Richardson mountains overnight. Amount 5 cm near the Ogilvie mountains. Wind light except east 50 km/h gusting to 70 near the Richardson mountains overnight. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind light except east 50 km/h gusting to 70 near the Richardson mountains in the morning and early in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 20 January 2023
